https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rnEZp4yeHfru0ujaHErcweUJYzZ.jpg Daryl Davis has an unusual hobby. As a musician he has played with legends like Chuck Berry and Little Richard, but in his spare time he likes to meet and befriend members of the Ku Klux Klan. Join Daryl on his personal quest to understand racism. Accidental Courtesy: Daryl Davis, Race & America
